title: Criticism of the Western Civilization-Col. 62 (Alcohol,Drugs 6)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 62 (Alcoholism, Drugs 6):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Ambrose & Deisler - Investigate Alcohol (2015)

-  Babor et al - Alcohol, No Ordinary Commodity; Research and Public Policy, 2e (2010)

-  Berridge - Demons; Our Changing Attitudes to Alcohol, Tobacco, & Drugs (2013)

-  Brick - Handbook of the Medical Consequences of Alcohol and Drug Abuse (2004)

-  Carlson & Carlson - Addiction; the Brain Disease (2010)

-  Chasnoff (Ed.) - Drugs, Alcohol, Pregnancy and Parenting (1988)

-  Clune - White Out; the Secret Life of Heroin (2013)

-  Cormier - Sex, Drugs, Rock N Roll (2015)

-  Crome et al (Eds.) - Substance Use and Older People (2015)

-  Freeman - Substance Abuse Intervention, Prevention, Rehabilitation, and Systems Change Strategies (2001)

-  Grimes & Grimes - Double Double; a Dual Memoir of Alcoholism (2013)

-  Hart - High Price; a Neuroscientist's Journey of Self-Discovery That Challenges Everything You Know about Drugs and Society (2013)

-  Henderson - Understanding Addiction (2000)

-  Howard - Drugs of Abuse; Pharmacology and Molecular Mechanisms (2014)

-  Hubbard & Martin (Eds.) - Substance Abuse in the Mentally and Physically Disabled (2001)

-  Hughley - I Want You to Shut the F#ck Up; How the Audacity of Dopes Is Ruining America (2012)

-  Hunt (Eds.) - Drugs and Culture; Knowledge, Consumption and Policy (2011)

-  Kendler & Prescott - Genes, Environment, and Psychopathology; Understanding the Causes of Psychiatric and Substance Use Disorders (2006)

-  Lee & Shlain - Acid Dreams; the Complete Social History of LSD; the CIA, the Sixties, and Beyond (1985)

-  Lessa & Scanlon - Substance Use Disorders (2006)

-  Lewis - Memoirs of an Addicted Brain; a Neuroscientist Examines His Former Life on Drugs (2011)

-  Maisto et al - Drug Use & Abuse, 7e (2015)

-  McCaffrey - Cocaine Wars (2011)

-  Miller (Ed.) - Brain Development; Normal Processes and the Effects of Alcohol and Nicotine (2006)

-  Neuberger & DiMartini (Eds.) - Alcohol Abuse and Liver Disease (2015)

-  Padwa & Cunningham - Addiction; a Reference Encyclopedia (2010)

-  Pierce & Toxqui (Eds.) - Alcohol in Latin America; a Social Cultural History (2014)

-  Power - Drugs 2.0; the Web Revolution That's Changing How the World Get High (2013)

-  Quinones - Dream Land; the True Tale of America's Opiate Epidemic (2015)

-  Rogers (Ed.) - Substance Use and Abuse, Britannica (2011)

-  Solomon (Ed.) - Alcoholism and Clinical Psychiatry (1982)

-  Straussner & Fewell (Eds.) - Children of Substance-Abusing Parents; Dynamics and Treatment (2011)

-  UNODC - Global Synthetic Drugs Assessment; Amphetamine-type Stimulants and New Psychoactive Substances (2014)

-  Watson (Ed.) - Substance Abuse During Pregnancy and Childhood (1995)

-  Young & McFadden - Marching Powder; a True Story of Friendship, Cocaine, and South America's Strangest Jail (2003)
